definitions.definition: Very busy with activity and confusion .
examples: The city center is so hectic at 8 in the morning that I go to work an hour beforehand to avoid the crowds

definitions.definition: Denoting a type of fever accompanying consumption and similar wasting diseases, characterised by flushed cheeks and dry skin.
Pertaining to or symptomatic of such a fever.

main_definition: ( figurative ) Very busy with activity and confusion .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Denoting a type of fever accompanying consumption and similar wasting diseases, characterised by flushed cheeks and dry skin.
( obsolete ) Pertaining to or symptomatic of such a fever.
